thread.title: CHS Girls' Soccer lose a close one Friday, struggle Saturday
thread.title_full: CHS Girls' Soccer lose a close one Friday, struggle Saturday

author: Times Report
title: CHS Girls' Soccer lose a close one Friday, struggle Saturday
text: CHS Girls' Soccer lose a close one Friday, struggle Saturday The Pirate girls have a tie but remain winless after the weekend. Comment Posted Oct. 5, 2015 at 11:48 AM By Times Report Posted Oct. 5, 2015 at 11:48 AM Crookston, Minn. The Pirate girls have a tie but remain winless after the weekend. They lost a tough one, 1-0 to Mesabi East onFriday, even though Reese said they had a decent amount of quality scoring chances. She said it was nice to see the Pirates getting some shooting opportunities and firing them at the net. Fridayâ€™s win was the first of the season for Mesabi East. The Pirates out-shot MesabiEast 11-8, with juniorBrita Fagerlund in goal for the Pirates. It was tougher going onSaturday when the Pirates hosted Hibbing-Chisholm and were shut out 5-0. It was the Bluestreaks third win of the season. The Pirates wrap up the regular season with games against Bemidji and EGF. By Times Report
